title: 6 X confin√©.e.s
overview: What happens inside when nothing happens outside? In the apartments, in the houses, in the heads? What emerges when one is stuck for weeks on end in a flat with one's family, with almost strangers or as a couple with no way out? 6 stories that have in common that they take place during the first confinement and that explore in different registers the way the best (sometimes) and the worst (very often) are expressed in this unprecedented situation.
